name: hesitatingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves pausing before doing or saying something usually because you are uncertain or nervous about it: When they asked if there were any volunteers in the audience who were willing to be hypnotized, a few hands hesitatingly went up. The student was shy and spoke hesitatingly at first before finding her voice. Related words

hesitancy
More examplesFewer examplesShe hesitatingly agreed to take on the assignment even though she had a lot of other work to do. I went slowly and hesitatingly up the steps to the front door and rang the bell.
